original_text: And Rachel said, With great wrestlings have I wrestled with my sister, and I have prevailed: and she called his name Naphtali.
korean_text: 라헬이 이르되 내가 언니와 크게 경쟁하여 이겼다 하고 그의 이름을 납달리라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: With great wrestlings have I wrestled with my sister
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나의 누이와 큰 싸움으로 싸웠고

sentences.original_text: and she called his name Naphtali
